highlights: Serves as a counselor for prospective students applying to a Bachelor degree program at a premier arts college in New York City
Assisted Admissions team review about 5,500 applications to render Admissions Decision and compiles a researched list of students eligible for merit-based scholarships
Promptly responds to daily inquires from prospective students and admitted students
Managed and executed the design and outline of keynote presentation used during high school visits and information nights across the country

projects.title: Recruitment Presentation
projects.description: Outlined and designed a Recruitment Presentation using Keynote, Adobe Premiere, and Adobe Photoshop to highlight the Facilities, Programs, Alumni Network, and Admissions process at SVA. This presentation was used by the recruitment staff within the Admissions office while visiting feeder schools and other high schools across the United States and Canada

highlights: Manages digital imaging tasks such as compositing, image retouching, digital scanning and printing
Oversees extensive exhibition archive which includes press releases, floor plans and diagrams, budgeting worksheets, sales records, loans and contracts, and installation photography
Assists in the creation of detailed installation manuals for artworks using InDesign and Illustrator
Assists Studio Manager with daily administrative tasks including managing expenses, maintaining office organization, ordering supplies, and answering the phone

projects.title: Exhibition Archive
projects.description: Starting in 2013, I assessed and reevaluated the state of Josephine's exhibition archive and created a strategy for sourcing missing documents that provide a detailed account of the Studio's involvement with the project and how it influences the provenance of Josephine's work

highlights: Acts as liaison between museum staff and patrons by informing guests of special events, museum hours, and musician line up; directing visitors to appropriate lines; and assisting with point of sale customer service
